customer_input: We’re planning a Red Sea dive trip and care most about visibility and calm seas. Is late October better than early December for Hurghada vs Marsa Alam? We’d like a mix of reefs and maybe one wreck day.

I’m a diver but my partner doesn’t dive and wants beach time and snorkeling. Can you recommend a Red Sea base where I can do 2 dives a day while they have things to do nearby? We’re thinking Sharm or Dahab.

Can you reserve 3 spots on a Brothers/Daedalus/Elphinstone liveaboard for mid-May? We’re all AOW with 60–120 dives and want nitrox. Please confirm cabin options and whether you need a deposit to hold it.

We’re booked for a day boat from Hurghada marina tomorrow, but our hotel changed and the pickup time no longer works. Can you move us to a later boat or adjust the transfer? We don’t want to miss the dives.

Your quote is in EUR but my card is in GBP and I’m worried about exchange rates. Do you charge any card processing fee for the liveaboard deposit? Also, can you issue an invoice showing the split between diving and transfers?

We just got the final bill and it includes nitrox charges we didn’t expect. The package description said ‘nitrox available’ but didn’t mention a daily fee. Can you explain what’s included and adjust it if this is an error?

Our flight to Marsa Alam was cancelled and the next available is two days later, so we’ll miss most of the liveaboard. What are our options to cancel or move to another departure? Please tell me what refund we can expect.

If the coast guard closes the sea due to wind, do we get a refund for missed dives? We’re booking a week of day boats in Sharm and want to understand the policy before paying. Is there an option to reschedule within the same week?

We land at Hurghada at 01:10 and need to get to the liveaboard at the marina the same night. Do you provide late-night transfers and will the boat still accept check-in that late? We have two large dive bags each.

My checked bag with my BCD and regs didn’t arrive in Sharm. We’re supposed to dive tomorrow morning and I’m panicking. Can you help arrange rentals and possibly deliver gear to the hotel if the airline finds it later?

We’re staying in Dahab and want to dive the Blue Hole and Canyon, but we prefer small groups and early starts. Can you suggest a 3-day plan with shore dives and approximate timings? We’re okay with a guide requirement if needed.

On the North & Tiran route, how many dives per day do you typically do and are night dives included? We’re trying to plan our no-fly time for a Sunday evening flight. Also, do you offer Thistlegorm as part of that itinerary?

I forgot my dive computer and torch at home. Can I rent both in Hurghada for a week of day boats, and do you have wrist-style computers with nitrox? Please tell me the deposit amount and what ID you need.

The rental regulator free-flowed on descent today and the guide had to share air for a moment. I’m really upset because this could have been dangerous. I want to know what you’ll do to investigate and how you’ll prevent this happening again tomorrow.

We’re Open Water with about 25 dives each and want to do Brothers/Daedalus/Elphinstone. Are we allowed on that route, or do we need Advanced and a minimum number of dives? If we need training, can we do AOW in the Red Sea before the liveaboard?

Do I need to bring my nitrox certification card for a Sharm liveaboard, or is a digital copy okay? Also, is there a medical questionnaire we must complete in advance? One of us has mild asthma and wants to be sure it’s acceptable.
After today’s second dive in Marsa Alam I have tingling in my arm and feel unusually tired. I’m worried it could be DCS. What should I do right now and can you help contact the nearest chamber?

I got stung by something during a shore dive in Dahab and now there’s a rash and burning sensation. I’m not sure if it’s a jellyfish or fire coral. Can you advise first aid and whether it’s safe to dive tomorrow?

Today’s boat in Hurghada was packed and the briefing was rushed, so we didn’t feel safe. We paid for a ‘small group’ package but it didn’t match what was promised. I want a partial refund or to be moved to a different operator for the rest of the week.

Can you send the final travel voucher with hotel pickup details and emergency contact numbers? Also, do we need a visa on arrival for Egypt if we’re only staying in Sharm for a week of diving? We’re flying in from the EU and want to avoid surprises at the airport.
